title: LF 2 people for 3s
body:
This is gonna be pretty simple.  I'm a bronze 2 player but have played vs higher players in 3s and have beat them i did 3s a while back with 2 plats and we vsed golds/plats and i held my own and won.  

I'm looking for 2 people that wanna get serious about this and try to rank high i mean legit serious not people that rage after one loss or " we didn't rank high enough I'm out" i'm won 4-5 placement games and had someone leave because we didn't place in Gold like smh...

I'm going to play the AP role in this case its my main role i can play other roles easily if need be. 

 I'm not picky at all about rank just be able to hold your own is all i ask and don't rage and be respectful not everyone has a good game so if i do bad or if a teammate does bad don't bash them that does the team no good you won't believe how many times I've seen this happen 

Either post in here or add me on LoL Doctorpwnage69
